tag.name: grid

attribute.description: It indicates the collection to be iterated by the component. Single objects is converted to Collection using immutable Arrays.asList(...)
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java to be made available the object of iteration
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable to be available to current iteration
attribute.name: varStatus

attribute.description: Indicates the label component
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n)
attribute.name: labelKey

attribute.description: Indicates the url component a ser utilizada caso haja paginação
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Indicates the component title when there are no lines available
attribute.name: noRowText

attribute.description: Indicates the component title key (i18n) when there are no lines available
attribute.name: noRowTextKey

tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridPaginate

attribute.description: Indicates the total number of records in component
attribute.name: totalResults

attribute.description: It indicates the default number of results per page. Default: 60. Options: 20,40,60,80,100
attribute.name: resultsPerPage

attribute.description: It indicates the size of pagination block on the left and right from the current page. Default: 4
attribute.name: range

tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridSearch
tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridExport

attribute.description: It indicates the final name of the exported file. Default: data.(csv,xml,pdf,xlsx)
attribute.name: fileName

attribute.description: It indicates if export support pdf file. Default: true
attribute.name: pdf

attribute.description: It indicates if export support xlsx file. Default: true
attribute.name: xlsx

attribute.description: It indicates if export support csv file. Default: true
attribute.name: csv

attribute.description: It indicates if export support xml file. Default: true
attribute.name: xml

tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridHeader
tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridColumn

attribute.description: It indicates whether the column should be exported
attribute.name: exportable

attribute.description: Indicates the alignment of the content. Default: left. Options: left, center, right
attribute.name: align

attribute.description: Indicates the label component
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Indicates the label key (i18n) component
attribute.name: labelKey

tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridBody
tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridFooter
tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridColumnData

attribute.description: It indicates a type format in which the value must be converted. Default options: date,datetime, timestamp, hour, currency, zipCode, cnpj, tel, cpf
attribute.name: formatter

attribute.description: Indicates the alignment of the content. Default: left. Options: left, center, right
attribute.name: align

attribute.description: Indicates the component state. Default: default. Options: danger, info, success, default
attribute.name: state

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: It indicates whether the column should be collapsable. Default false
attribute.name: collapsable

attribute.description: It indicates whether the column should be exported. Default false
attribute.name: exportable

tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>

tag.name: gridToolbar

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be rendered
attribute.name: rendered

tag.example: <html:grid var="person" data="${ persons }" label="My grid"> <html:gridExport/> <html:gridPaginate totalResults="${ totalResults }"></html:gridPaginate> <html:gridSearch/> <html:gridToolbar> <html:alert state="danger">my toolbar</html:alert> </html:gridToolbar> <html:gridHeader> <html:gridColumn label="Column 1" align="left" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 2" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> <html:gridColumn label="Column 3" align="center" exportable="true"></html:gridColumn> </html:gridHeader> <html:gridBody> <html:gridColumnData align="right" exportable="true"> ${ person.name } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" > ${ person.likeChocolate } </html:gridColumnData> <html:gridColumnData align="center" exportable="true" collapsable="true"> ${ person.cpf } </html:gridColumnData> </html:gridBody> </html:grid>
